Movie.controllers

Class MovieListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Movie.controllers.MovieListController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/movie")
public class MovieListController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to test interactions with the MySQL database using the MovieDao class.

        @RequestMapping(value="/create/{title}/{categoryID}")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String create(@PathVariable(value="title")

                                                                                                      @PathVariable(value="categoryID")
                                                                                                      java.lang.Long categoryID)
        Create a new movie and save it in the database.
        Parameters:
        title - new movie's title
        categoryID - The new movie's category id
        Returns:
        A string describing if the movie is successfully created or not.

      • addCategory

        @RequestMapping(value="/addCategory/{videoID}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addCategory(@PathVariable(value="videoID")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long videoID,
                                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                                   Movie.models.Category category)
        Add category for movie.
        Parameters:
        videoID - The id of the movie to add the category.
        category - The category to be added to the movie.
        Returns:
        The the categories of the movie after adding new category, or a message error if the movie is not found.
